tool_description: Get YouTube Data without YouTube API key. Fetch videos general info, statistics, channel info, and much more! [Status page](https://updown.io/p/kg53a)
name: YouTube Data APIs
title: YouTube Data APIs

api_list.name: Get channel data
api_list.description: Returns full data of the channel
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-data-apis.p.rapidapi.com/api/channel"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-data-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
